info.name: HorribleSubs & Disqus Dark Mode (Araragi Version)
info.description:
ALL CREDIT GOES TO NETo-kun FOR PROVIDING THE ORIGINAL CSS.
Provides a Dark Theme for HorribleSubs. Changes a few things here and there compared to NETos version.
